root.name: Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number
root.description: OverviewWrong Number's story will be tied to that of the first game, and will follow several parallel plots. Hotline Miami's main character has only a minor role and is not playable.The game is set to be released some time in 2014.SoundtrackSeveral of the artists whose music was featured in the original's soundtrack will also contribute to Wrong Number, including Perturbator, M.O.O.N., and Jasper Byrne.
